casebody.data:
2002-1983 (La. 10/14/02)

Vanessa WILLIAMS v. HOLIDAY INN WORLDWIDE, et al. No. 2002-CC-1983. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Pinkerton Security & Investigation Services Inc.; — Other; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. A, No. 97-16374; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-0762.

Denied.
